msg: OAK-2029 - Oak Lucene index doesn't get notified about updates when index is stored on the file system

author: markg
msg: Addressed issues from Joern's code review, also made use of hierarchy configurable, as well as added boosting at index time to administrative boundary types and populated place types so that these hits are more heavily weighted in the index.
